mapper.select: SELECT UIZ.BASE_YM /*사용일시 운영비카드사용내역 기준년월?*/ , ENTRP_DV_CD /*센터*/ , UIZ.CRCDNO_ENCR /*카드번호*/ , UIZ.MRC_TOBZ_NM /*가맹점*/ , UIZ.CARD_APRNO /*승인번호*/ , ABAS.USE_AMT /*사용금액*/ , DTL.OPCS_ADJ_EXCD_YN/*정산제외여부*/ , UIZ.OPCS_ADJ_SMRY_DV_CD /*적요입력 - 구분*/ , UIZ.OJ_APY_CN /*적요입력 - 대상*/ , UIZ.PURP_SMRY_CN /*적요입력 - 목적*/ , UIZ.USR_SMRY_CN /*사용금액 - 구매품목 및 사용내역*/ , DTL.DST_WHTX /*원천세 정산 - 원천세 정산*/ , CIZ.ADJ_YN /*원천세 정산 - 정산 여부*/ FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_BAS ABAS INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_DTL DTL ON ABAS.OPCS_ADJ_NO = DTL.OPCS_ADJ_NO INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_USE_REL REL ON DTL.OPCS_ADJ_NO = REL.OPCS_ADJ_NO INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_CARD_IZ CIZ ON ABAS.OPCS_ADJ_NO = CIZ.OPCS_ADJ_NO INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_OPCS_CARD_USE_IZ UIZ ON CIZ.UIZBASE_YM = UIZ.UIZBASE_YM AND CIZ.ENTRP_DV_CD = UIZ.ENTRP_DV_CD AND CIZ.MSCR_YN = UIZ.MSCR_YN AND CIZ.PSTN_DV_CD = UIZ.PSTN_DV_CD INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_OPCS_CNFM_BAS CBAS ON ABAS.BASE_YM = CBAS.BASE_YM AND ABAS.ENTRP_DV_CD = CBAS.ENTRP_DV_CD AND ABAS.PSTN_DV_CD = CBAS.PSTN_DV_CD AND ABAS.MSCR_YNCBAS = CBAS.MSCR_YNCBAS INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_BASE_BAS BBAS ON ABAS.ENTRP_DV_CD = BBAS.ENTRP_DV_CD AND ABAS.BASE_YM = BBAS.BASE_YM AND ABAS.PSTN_DV_CD = BBAS.PSTN_DV_CD AND ABAS.MSCR_YN = BBAS.MSCR_YN
